alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Western Columbia (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 03 at 3:26AM EST until February 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 to 35 below zero. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Litchfield and Southern Litchfield Counties. In New York, Eastern Greene, Western Columbia and Eastern Dutchess Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 to 20 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will plummet today, and will be 5 to 20 below zero through the day. The lowest wind chills are expected tonight into early Saturday morning. Winds will gust from 30 to 40 miles per hour into tonight, which could result in in isolated power outages.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Western Columbia
